title: Double thread
creator_credit: G R Instruction and Mary Field
brief_description: How the daily routine is organised for the children’s own needs in a modern well-equipped nursery school in England. Every activity is designed to help the individual child’s development, and to encourage their adjustment to social and group relationships. The “double thread” refers to the inter-relations of home and kindergarten in the growing child’s life.
